error_msg: We can't process your request. Please try again later.
introScreenDescription_1: Experience seamless and efficient deliveries for your small business with Saayer. Get ready to elevate your delivery services and delight your customers.
introScreenDescription_2: Saayer streamlines your order process, making it easy to manage and fulfill deliveries. From order creation to tracking, our app simplifies every step, so you can focus on what matters most—growing your business.
introScreenDescription_3: Keep your customers in the loop with Saayer's real-time tracking feature. Enhance transparency and build trust by allowing your customers to track their deliveries live. Make every delivery experience memorable.
empty_fields_error: Please, fill out all the fields in a valid format
name: Name
verify_otp_desc: We texted you OTP. Please enter it below
invalid_otp_error_description: The OTP you have entered is incorrect
user_info_progress: You are few steps away from completing your profile.
user_info_completed: Saayer is here to make your shipping experience smarter, easier and more efficient. Let's do this!
empty_shipments_desc: Oops! It looks like there are currently no {}.
received_msg: Congratulations! Your shipment has been successfully received. This message confirms that your package has reached its destination and is now in your possession. Whether it's a long-awaited delivery or a routine package, we're delighted to inform you that your shipment journey has come to a successful conclusion. Take a moment to inspect your package and ensure everything is as expected. If you have any questions or concerns regarding your shipment, feel free to reach out to our customer support team for assistance. Thank you for choosing Saayer, and we hope your experience with us has been smooth and satisfactory.
delivered_msg: Great news! Your shipment has been successfully delivered. Sit back and relax knowing that your package has reached its destination. If you have any questions or concerns regarding the delivery, feel free to reach out to our customer support team. Thank you for choosing our service, and we hope you enjoy your delivered items!
paid_msg: Congratulations! Your shipment payment has been successfully processed. You're all set to send your package on its journey. Thank you for choosing our services. Your payment has been securely received, ensuring a smooth and expedited shipping process. Stay tuned for updates on your shipment's progress. Should you have any questions or require assistance, feel free to reach out to our support team. We appreciate your business and look forward to serving you again in the future.
new_shipment_home_card_label: You can now request a new shipment with Saayer
empty_addresses_book_desc: Oops! It looks like there are currently no addresses.
complete_profile_desc: Unlock the full potential of your experience by completing your profile! Take a moment to update your information and enhance your journey with us. Your privacy and preferences matter, and completing your profile allows us to serve you better.
no_reports_desc: Reports are valuable tools that offer insights into various aspects of your activity, such as finances, analytics, or performance metrics. If you haven't generated any reports yet, this space will remain empty until you do so.
no_bills_desc: Rest assured, if you have any pending invoices or upcoming bills, they will be displayed here for your convenience. Keep track of your financial obligations effortlessly and stay informed about any outstanding payments through this streamlined interface. Enjoy the simplicity of managing your bills hassle-free.
log_in_title: Log In to Saayer: Your Smarter Shipping Solution
log_in_message: Please log in to your Saayer account to access all the powerful shipping tools and features. Let's get started on making your shopping experience smarter, easier, and more efficient!
empty_notifications_desc: Oops! It looks like there are currently no notifications.
